name: The Perfect Heist
description:
Three friends who were wronged by the bank they worked in decided to get some payback so they devised the perfect heist. In order for the heist to be successful, they need to work together to get the highest score possible. The hacker is responsible for taking down the security systems. The distraction is responsible for making a scene in order to get the attention of the people in the bank. The robber is the one actually getting the money. They must all work to pull off the perfect heist.

CONTROLS:

W / Up Arrow: Distraction minigame Input.

S / Down Arrow: Distraction minigame Input.

A / Left Arrow: Distraction minigame Input / move player left.

D / Right Arrow: Distraction minigame Input / move player right.

Esc: Pause Game.

Select Menu with mouse.
